name: Northware
description: Northware is an app development company specializing in application development, database and applications for iphone / ipad. They are an "IT Consulting" specialist in software development based on Microsoft .NET, Java and iOS. They have consultants with experience in the most advanced technologies to support your strategy in information systems.
